data.title: Lovely Local Spot
data.text: Beth Marie's is a place I discovered in college and have been back multiple times since moving from Denton. This ice cream just tastes different. The homemade quality and variety of flavors offers something to satisfy everybody's palette. My personal favorite is Cappucino Chip. I have tried a few other flavors and despite them being very good as well, I stick to the same one more often than not. In addition to quality product, Beth Marie'a offers the small town, family owned local charm that Denton is famous for. A warm greeting welcomes every customer as they enter into the old fashioned ice cream parlor creating such a warm atmosphere to enjoy a cold treat!

data.title: Tasty!
data.text: Lots of ice cream flavors, plus a small food menu.  Plenty of seating and the workers were helpful and friendly.  Very reasonably priced.

data.title: Delicious ice cream
data.text: The ice cream was creamy and tasty. There must have been at least fifty flavors and I chose coconut and black cherry in a homemade waffle cone. Divine!

data.title: Tasty, homemade ice cream
data.text: There are always a ton of flavors and someone to help you pick which one you would like. Always have a good experience when I come even when there is a line.

data.title: Old style Ice Cream bar!
data.text:
Have been many times.  Always great choices in homemade-style icecream and all the sundries.  Can always count on a treat.  Also good to take a quart home! (Better Bargain!)

Heads up - the location near the theater can be busy around movie time changes.

data.title: The best homemade ice cream in North Texas
data.text: All homemade ice cream, many flavors, friendly service at the old fashioned soda fountain! On the famous Denton square with a view of he courthouse. Have returned many times. Another location is across from the Cinemark in Denton, the perfect place to go after a movie.

data.title: Great ice cream, huge menu...however its not always in stock
data.text: GREAT FOOD AND ICE CREAM TYPE TREATS. Happy to wait in a long line, late night after dinner on the square. tHE MENU IS EXCITING AND GIVES YOU SOMETHING TO READ WHILE IN YOUR WAIT. Unfortunately all 4 menu items my family asked for were seasonal and not available so we got to the front of the line, pressures was one, to select something different on the fly. iTS ALL GOOD, plenty to choose from.

data.title: Best Ice Cream in Denton, Texas!
data.text: Beth Marie's is hands down the best ice cream in Denton and all of North Texas for that matter.  They have many delicious homemade flavors to choose from daily.  You can also stop by for a light lunch.  They have soup and sandwiches.  The atmosphere is that of an old fashioned ice cream parlor.

data.title: Best place on Denton Square
data.text: Our son used to work here...it's a great family atmosphere and the ice cream is home made! It's located on the south side of Denton square across from the beautiful Russian gothic courthouse.

data.title: Homemade cones
data.text: The smell of homemade cones welcomes you in.  They have a very good taste. The ice cream flavor selection has a variety for the unique and traditional. I asked for one kind and was given another.  It was good. The turtle is a flavor I can recommend.

data.title: Wednesday night visit
data.text: Neat little spot. Very very busy for almost nine on a wed night. Everything is homemade and it is yummy. They make all their ice cream right here. Worth a stop.

data.title: Best Local Ice Cream
data.text: Cute 50s atmosphere with delicious homemade ice cream! This is a great place to bring out of town family and friends to introduce them to Denton and also just a cool hangout place with friends!

data.title: Afternoon ice cream
data.text: Stopped in for some ice cream- heard great reviews. It was ok. Hard for me to give a great review since I'm not a major ice cream eater. It was awful just trying to get a parking spot to try it out. Would I recommend it- sure - they have many varieties of ice cream.

data.title: Great icecream! Impressive variety great seevice
data.text:
When you enter you can just smell the waffle cones being made. As you approach the freezers, you are encountered with difficult choice of choosing a flavor. Too many and all so good! I had one with marshmallows 
 So good! Service was great. Smiling young girls that seem to love their job and great with customer service!
If in Denton, go have an icecream!

data.title: Best of the Best
data.text: We are so blessed to have this place here in Denton.  It is one the few things in this town truly worth the journey here.

data.title: Best hidden ice cream place ever
data.text: I literally grew up going to this place every weekend when I was a child. The quality of the ice cream blows my mind. There is always a long line and for good reason as you feel like a kid in a candy store with the top notch service they provide. A very good date location as you can also enjoy your ice cream on their street side patio.

data.title: Good stuff!
data.text: A family favorite! Always lots of choices and always great ice cream! Sandwich choices are good as is the service.

data.title: Best ice cream in town!
data.text:
We've been to Beth Marie's so often, I've lost count. I always get a banana split which has just the right amount of ice cream to satisfy a sweet tooth. Their root beer floats are delicious as well. They taste like they aren't done with regular root beer, but something made from scratch. 

There are so many flavors to try, you'll definitely have a hard time choosing. I always take my out of town guests for a visit if they want ice cream. There really is no substitute for Beth Marie's.

data.title: Amazing ice cream
data.text: Awesome old fashioned homemade ice cream!  The place has an ice cream parlor feel from days gone by.  A must try for visitors and locals alike!

data.title: Old Fashion Ice Cream And Soda Parlor
data.text: My Family and I enjoyed our mid afternoon ice cream here today. The setting takes you back in time to the old Parlor Days but with a modern twist. Great ice cream in this neat nastolgic store.. The Brownie Since a was fantastic..
